backend/main.mo: Main canister logic providing product catalog, carts, orders, user profiles, logo and CEO photo storage, with admin-gated mutations and public queries.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading actor state by adding a new logo field while preserving existing stored data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and tests with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React application and loading the entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theming, and global providers, defining all public and admin-protected routes.
frontend/src/components/about/CeoPhotoUp: Allows admins to upload and replace the CEO photo with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Displays a searchable product table with edit and delete actions, including a deletion confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageUploa: Handles product image selection, upload progress, preview, and removal, emitting updates via a callback.
frontend/src/components/admin/LogoUpload: Provides UI for admins to upload, preview, and replace the site logo with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Form component for creating or editing products, handling input state, image upload, and submission via admin product mutations.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, and animated main content area.
frontend/src/components/Auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with conditional text based on login state and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling login/logout via Internet Identity and showing profile name when signed in.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProtectedAd: Checks authentication and admin role before rendering children, otherwise shows a loading spinner or access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/cart/AddToCartBu: Renders quantity input and button to add a product to the cart, enforcing auth and stock checks.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartLineIte: Displays a cart item with product info, quantity controls, total price, and actions to update or remove it.
frontend/src/components/products/Categor: Category tab selector that triggers filtering when a category is chosen.
Static image strip displaying tool-category icons for visual navigation.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Shows a product preview card with image, details, price, stock state, and link to product page.
Safely displays a product image or a fallback icon if no image is available.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with links, contact info, and a dynamic copyright message referencing caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Shows the site header with navigation, logo, cart indicator, login, and a mobile menu, adapting links based on admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on authentication, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Provides mutations for creating, updating, and deleting products, invalidating product queries and showing toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Hooks for retrieving and mutating cart data, including adding, updating, removing items, clearing the cart, and computing totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useCeoPhoto.ts: Fetches and updates the CEO photo stored in the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current caller's user profile, handling actor-loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserRole.ts: Fetches the current caller's user role from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogo.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch and update a logo via the backend actor, with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Implements hooks to place orders and fetch single, user, or all orders using the actor with identity-based enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Contains hooks to fetch all products or a single product and a helper to extract sorted product categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a mutation hook to save the callerâ€™s user profile and invalidate its related query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables, dark mode styles, animations, and interaction utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page showing CEO information, company values, and admin-only CEO photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Displays all customer orders with loading states, order details, and user profile info.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page for managing products, creating/editing items, and updating the site logo.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items, calculates totals, and provides navigation to catalog or checkout with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Fetches products, supports category filtering, and renders a product grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows order items, calculates totals, places orders, and displays a confirmation screen after successful purchase.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero banner, feature highlights, and navigation to catalog or about pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays detailed product info with add-to-cart support and navigation back to the catalog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, custom colors, animations, fonts, and theme extensions for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project's schema, state, features, architectural notes, and requirements for the FS Enterprises website.
